name.en: Introduction to Big Data Analytics and Applications
name.ch: 巨量資料分析與應用介紹

department.ch: 應用地質研究所碩士班

goal.en: Introduction of Big Data Computing and Applications in Science and Technology
goal.ch: 巨量資料運算的原理與科學及技術應用之介紹

content.en:
“1. Primers
1.1 Background
1.2 Big Data Definition
1.3 Big Data Analytics and Applications
1.4 Basic Big Data Programming and Practices
2. Introduction of Big Data Storage
2.1 Introduction of Big Data Storage Framework
2.2 Analysis and Selection of Big Data Storage
2.3 Introduction of Tools of Data Storage
3. Introduction to Big Data Processing
3.1 Integration of Data Stores
3.2 Data Connection, Transformation and Extraction
3.3 Hadoop MapReduce Methodology
3.4 Data Streaming Processing
3.5 Data Processing Tools
4. Introduction of Big Data Analytics
4.1 General Statistics Concept
4.2 Data Analytics Methods
4.3 Clustering and Machine Learning
4.4 Data Analytics Tools
5. Introduction of Big Data Applications
5.1 Data Privacy and Security
5.2 Applications in Earth Science, Environment and Disaster Reduction.
5.3 Government Big Data Applications
5.4 Open Data Applications“
content.ch:
“1. 巨量資料前言
1.1 背景與緣起
1.2 Big Data定義
1.3 Big Data 分析與應用
1.4 基礎Big Data 程式撰寫介紹與練習
2. 巨量資料儲存介紹
2.1 Big Data 儲存架構
2.2 分析與選擇 Big Data 儲存
2.3 資料儲存工具介紹
3 巨量資料處理介紹
3.1 異質資料儲存整合
3.2 資料連結、轉換與萃取
3.3 Hadoop MapReduce 方法論
3.4 資料串流處理
3.5 資料處理工具介紹
4 巨量資料分析介紹
4.1 數據統計概念介紹
4.2 資料分析方法介紹
4.3 叢集方法與機器學習
4.4 資料分析工具介紹
4.5 Big Data 分析實作
5 巨量資料應用介紹
5.1 資料隱私與安全議題
5.2 地球科學與環境防災上應用
5.3 政府巨量資料應用
5.4 開放資料應用 (Open Data)“

textbook.en: “1. James et al. (2013) An Introduction to Statistical Leaning: With applications in R . Springer. 2. Zumel, N. and Mount, J. (2014). Practical Data Science with R . Manning Publications. 3. Leskovec, J., Rajaraman, A. and Ullman, J. (2011). Mining of Massive Datasets .“
textbook.ch: “1. James et al. (2013) An Introduction to Statistical Leaning: With applications in R . Springer. 2. Zumel, N. and Mount, J. (2014). Practical Data Science with R . Manning Publications. 3. Leskovec, J., Rajaraman, A. and Ullman, J. (2011). Mining of Massive Datasets .“
